name: SpookHouse (Gibegy)
description:
You haven't heard from your grandma in some time, so to change things you decide to  go and pay her a visit to she what she is up to and how she is doing, Little did you know what you would find when you got to her house.

   In this short spooky adventure you will traverse a mysterious house,  solve puzzles, encounter a strange presence, and find out the truth of what really happened to grandma.

Game Design Team:
Ethan Gibson
James Oakes
Conner Jenkins

Assets:

  1. House: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/exterior/house/victorian-house--2
  2. Flashlight Audio: http://freesoundeffect.net/sound/flashlight-click-button-01-sound-effect
  3. Key: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/household/other/worn-key-730dba2058ea734...
